title: Japan: work and play in the land of the cherry blossom
brief_description: Brief look at varius aspects of Japanese life. Narration describing aspects of the culture is accompanied by footage of coastal villages involved in fishing and pearl harvesting followed by Tokyo urbanites attending flower shows and finally concluding with a description of geishas and footage of a geisha dance.
